item.title: Need help adding a BRAN NEW void
item.dc:creator: @tw33zy tw33zy
item.description:
@tw33zy wrote:

Hey guys, im adding shops to my server, i go into my client.java and search

wanneShop

These are the options what come up

private int WanneShop = 0;

[code]}

if (WanneShop > 0) {
	if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) {
		openUpShop(WanneShop);
		WanneShop = 0;
			}[/code]

Now this is the void i need to add

} } else if (NPCID == 1597) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 66;

I tryed putting it directly under

if (WanneShop > 0) { if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) { openUpShop(WanneShop); WanneShop = 0; }

But i just get errors… So, where do i put my void???

Please Please help!! I try and search

} else if (NPCID

But nothing shows up! Doesn’t find athing!!

So where do i put my void?

Regards
~Tw33zy
